definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Under the Mistletoes, let's give out our sweet kisses.
sentences.chinese: 在聖誕花環下，讓我們獻出甜吻。

sentences.english: They made necklaces and garlands of them.
sentences.chinese: 他們把蒲公英做成項鍊和花環。

sentences.english: On coop or kennel he hangs Parian wreaths;
sentences.chinese: 給雞籠和狗窩掛上白色的花環。

sentences.english: Apricot buds open into domed creamy-white rosettes.
sentences.chinese: 杏芽開放進入圓頂奶油白色花環。

sentences.english: What care I for the wreaths that can only give glory ?
sentences.chinese: 對於只給人以榮譽的花環我又何所掛懷？

sentences.english: I will deck thee with trophies, garlands of my defeat.
sentences.chinese: 我失敗的花環，我將用勝利品來裝飾你。

sentences.english: Garlands of fruit and leaves wind along the lower arches.
sentences.chinese: 水果和樹葉的花環纏繞在低矮的拱門上。

sentences.english: This personal friendship is shown by giving leis to one another.
sentences.chinese: 這個人的友誼被藉由把花環給彼此顯示。

sentences.english: He still may leave thy garland green.
sentences.chinese: 你的冬青花環依舊綠意盎然。

sentences.english: What care I for the wreaths that can only give glory?
sentences.chinese: 對於只給予人榮譽的花環我又何所掛懷？

sentences.english: The Lei or flower wreath is also in many songs and hulas.
sentences.chinese: 花環或花冠也在許多的歌曲與草裙舞中。

sentences.english: They made the flowers into garlands.
I try to wreath all the morning, but the flowers slip and they drop out.
sentences.chinese: 整個早晨我想編個花環，但是花兒滑掉了。

sentences.english: For early Christians, it was appropriate to have both colors in the holly wreath.
sentences.chinese: 對初代基督徒而言，冬青花環有這兩種顏色相當合宜。

sentences.english: I try to weave a wreath all the morning, but the flowers slip and they drop out.
sentences.chinese: 整個清晨我想編一個花環，可是花兒滑失了。

definition: to enhance by contrast/to set off/to serve as a background in order to bring out the subject with greater brilliance/to serve as a prop/a foil
